Package imagingbook.pub.regions.segment

Class SegmentationBackedRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.regions.BinaryRegion
      • imagingbook.pub.regions.segment.SegmentationBackedRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<BinaryRegion>, java.lang.Iterable<Pnt2d>
    public class SegmentationBackedRegion
extends BinaryRegion
    Binary region backed by the label array of a region segmenter.
